snippet: A jailhouse recording suggested that the lawyer, Mark O’Mara knew about a transfer of $37,000 George Zimmerman tried to make from his legal defense Web site.
abstract: George Zimmerman's lawyer Mark O'Mara rejects implications that he knew his client, charged with second-degree murder in the shooting of Trayvon Martin, had received $37,000 from a Web site before his initial bond hearing; jailhouse recording suggests he knew about the transfer.
lead_paragraph: A jailhouse recording suggested that the lawyer, Mark O’Mara knew about a transfer of $37,000 George Zimmerman tried to make from his legal defense Web site.

headline.main: Zimmerman Lawyer Denies Revelations in Martin Case
headline.print_headline: Zimmerman Lawyer Denies Revelations in Martin Case
